verbose_text: Although expression of miR-7 was sufficient to promote the neuroepithelial-to-neuroblast transition, we only observed a delay in transition in 30% of miR-7 CRISPR1 mutant clones (XREF_FIG E-2E ''), suggesting that transition can occur correctly in the absence of miR-7 and that only under certain circumstances does the loss of miR-7 affect timely neuroblast production.
